name: nativescript-connectivity-manager-plugin
description: This plugin provides a connectivity manager of Android and iOS.

scripts.demo:reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo:ios: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo:android: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --watch
scripts.plugin:prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-connectivity-manager-plugin && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-connectivity-manager-plugin && tns plugin add ../src
